set 'tags' and 'port-details' initial values in a response of floatingip

timeline.bodyText: Is this entity used by OpenStack only? If not we could use more generic name.

timeline.bodyText: FloatingIpRequest and FloatingIpResponse have a few common fields that are defined in CustomerResources. Should be a good idea to inherit from it.
